statements: UPDATE SpaceStationEnvironmentalData SET temperature = 25.4, humidity = 50.3 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE SpaceStationEnvironmentalData SET pressure = 1000.3, timestamp = '2022-01-15 12:00:00' WHERE station_name = 'ISS';
UPDATE SpaceStationEnvironmentalData SET humidity=30, pressure=101.5 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE SpaceStationEnvironmentalData SET temperature=23.5, timestamp='2022-12-01 10:15:00' WHERE station_name='ISS';
UPDATE space_station SET location = 'Mars Base' WHERE station_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE environmental_data SET atmospheric_pressure = 50.2, humidity = 70.5 WHERE station_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND timestamp = '2022-08-15 10:30:00';
UPDATE space_station SET temperature = 25.5, atmospheric_pressure = 1013.25 WHERE station_id = 'c1e31d8f-9e4d-4f10-89f3-1c577565b9d1';
UPDATE environmental_data SET humidity = 60.8, temperature = 26.3 WHERE station_id = 'e92f3e52-8c67-47f9-93d8-494ba8eb32e1';
UPDATE space_stations SET location='Mars' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE research_analysis SET researcher_name='Dr. Smith', analysis_result='Conclusive findings', report_date='2022-10-15' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE space_stations SET location = 'Mars Colony' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE research_analysis SET researcher_name = 'Dr. Smith', analysis_result = 'Positive findings on atmospheric composition' WHERE id = 3 AND data_id = 7;
UPDATE space_stations SET crew_capacity = 10, station_name = 'Alpha Station' WHERE station_id = 1;
UPDATE research_projects SET assigned_scientist = 'Dr. Smith', end_date = '2023-08-15' WHERE project_id = 3;
UPDATE space_stations SET crew_capacity = 10, station_name = 'Orion Station' WHERE station_id = 1;
UPDATE environmental_readings SET temperature = 25.75, pressure = 1013.50 WHERE station_id = 3 AND reading_time >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE SpaceStations SET location='Mars Colony' WHERE station_id=1;
UPDATE CarbonDioxideLevels SET co2_level=0.05 WHERE level_id=3;
UPDATE SpaceStations SET station_name = 'Alpha Station', location = 'Mars Base' WHERE station_id = 1;
UPDATE ResearchData SET data = 'New research findings on exoplanets', timestamp = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE station_id = 2;
